mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flow_chain ( tenant_id, chain_name, chain_code, description, config_type, status, current_version, transactional, transaction_timeout, transaction_propagation, application_name, chain_enable, namespace, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tenantId}, #{chainName}, #{chainCode}, #{description}, #{configType}, #{status}, #{currentVersion}, #{transactional}, #{transactionTimeout}, #{transactionPropagation}, #{applicationName}, #{chainEnable}, #{namespace}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE flow_chain SET chain_name = #{chainName}, chain_code = #{chainCode}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, current_version = #{currentVersion}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM flow_chain WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE flow_chain SET deleted_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flow_chain WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
